name: Warchief

skills.name: Brutal Force
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Each hit also heals this Champion and the ally with the lowest HP by 3% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
Level 2: Damage +15%
Level 3: Damage +15%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Heal +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 1 DEF

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Marauder (Cooldown: 3 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Steals all buffs from the target, and places a [Provoke] debuff on them for 3 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn. Then places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is proportional to this Champion’s DEF.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +20%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 7: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4.3 DEF

skills.name: Standstill (Passive)
skills.description: Whenever an ally under a [Shield] buff is hit by an enemy, heals that ally by 25% of the damage dealt to the [Shield]. Increases this Champion’s DEF by 10% for each enemy under a [Provoke] debuff. Will also increase this Champion’s DEF by 5% for each enemy not under a [Provoke] debuff.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 60.
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: PRIMARY: DEF% (scales damage, Shield value, survivability)
TERTIARY: SPD 170-180+ (turn cycling, Magma Dragon uptime)
QUATERNARY: HP% 40k-50k+ (sustain, A1 healing scales MAX HP)
OPTIONAL: C.RATE 100%, C.DMG (Doom Tower nuker build)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 200+ ACC, 170+ SPD, HP 40k+, DEF 3000+. Low priority (reflect nerf).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 200+ ACC, 170+ SPD, DEF 3000+, HP 40k+. FK multi-hit, moderate utility.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 250+ ACC (Magma Dragon 100% uptime), 180+ SPD, DEF 4000+, HP 50k+, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG. TOP TIER Kuldath.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ ACC, 200+ SPD, DEF 3500+, HP 45k+, RES 200+. Provoke tank build. Moderate priority.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 220+ ACC, 180+ SPD, DEF 3500+, HP 45k+. Provoke + sustain. Good utility.

recommended_gear: Lifesteal + Speed (Doom Tower Magma Dragon): DEF%, C.RATE, C.DMG, ACC, SPD. Sustain via Lifesteal + A1 heals.
DEF + Speed (Doom Tower/Dungeons): DEF%, SPD, ACC, HP%. Max DEF for Shield value and damage.
Perception + Speed (High ACC): DEF%, ACC, SPD, HP%. Late-game Doom Tower Hard (250+ ACC Magma Dragon).
Retaliation + DEF (Arena cheese): DEF%, ACC, RES, HP%. Extra Provoke attempts on counterattack. Community-recommended.
Immortal + Speed (Faction Wars): DEF%, SPD, ACC, HP%. Passive regen + A1 heals = extreme sustain.

doom_tower: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Wrath of the Slain, Cycle of Violence, Bring It Down, Blood Shield, Giant Slayer (multi-hit A1)
DEFENSE: Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution (extra Provoke attempts)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel
Priority: Giant Slayer > Retribution > Delay Death > Pinpoint Accuracy. Magma Dragon specialist.
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Giant Slayer
DEFENSE: Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel
Priority: Giant Slayer > Pinpoint Accuracy > Delay Death. FK multi-hit synergy.
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Giant Slayer
DEFENSE: Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel
Priority: Giant Slayer > Delay Death > Retribution. Sustain + Provoke.
general: Defense tree masteries (Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution)
Giant Slayer T6 for multi-hit A1 (3 hits)
Retribution for extra Provoke attempts (community-tested Arena/Retaliation builds)

blessings: Brimstone (PRIMARY - Doom Tower Magma Dragon): Debuffer role, increases Provoke damage synergy.
Polymorph (Arena): Transform on death cheese, second-chance Provoke tank.
Temporal Chains (Arena/Doom Tower): Turn meter control after Provoke lands, lockdown synergy.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior generally good. Prioritizes A2 Marauder when available (correct for Provoke uptime). No major issues reported for Doom Tower auto-play Magma Dragon.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Magma Dragon 100% Provoke lock prevents devastating attacks (TOP TIER cheese). Arena Retaliation set: counterattack on hit = extra Provoke attempts, can lock entire teams with decent support. Historical reflect damage cheese nerfed Patch 1.14 (Dec 2019) - no longer viable for CB/Spider.

mechanics_advisory: NICHE SPECIALIST: TOP TIER Doom Tower Kuldath Magma Dragon (100% Provoke uptime prevents devastating attacks, community-rated god-tier boss killer). Historical context: Was strong CB utility until reflect damage nerfed Patch 1.14 (Dec 2019) → vault lord → redeemed by Doom Tower release Dec 2020. Patch 4.70 buff: A2 cooldown 4→3 (Oct 2021). Current role: Magma Dragon specialist, moderate utility elsewhere (Fire Knight multi-hit, Faction Wars sustain, Arena Provoke tank). Exceptional +60 ACC aura (all content). Build priority: Doom Tower (DEF/C.RATE/C.DMG Lifesteal), DEF scaling all skills (4.3 DEF A2, Shield value), Provoke synergy with Passive (+10% DEF per Provoked enemy). MUST BOOK A2 for 100% Magma Dragon uptime (cooldown 4→3 critical). Community consensus: 'God-like Kuldath', 'Vault lord everywhere else'. If you face Magma Dragon regularly (Doom Tower Hard rotation), S-rank specialist. Otherwise, B-rank situational.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: User screenshot: 100% stat confidence (HP 18990, ATK 848, DEF 1465, SPD 102, C.RATE 15, C.DMG 50, RES 50, ACC 10). Skills from Ayumilove canonical, cross-validated HellHades.

author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Legendary Defense Force, Skinwalkers faction. TOP TIER Doom Tower Kuldath Magma Dragon specialist (100% Provoke uptime). Historical vault lord post-reflect nerf (Patch 1.14 Dec 2019), redeemed by Doom Tower release (Dec 2020). Exceptional +60 ACC aura all content. MUST BOOK A2 for Magma Dragon viability. Community: 'God-like Kuldath', 'Vault lord everywhere else'.

update_notes.last_patch: Patch 4.70 (Oct 2021): A2 Marauder cooldown reduced 4→3 turns. Patch 1.14 (Dec 2019): Reflect damage nerf (Lifesteal no longer works with reflect damage).
